events.name: Intro to Web Dev, Front-end workshop with JavaScript, HTML, and CSS
events.description: Learn the basics of web development with JavaScript, HTML, and CSS. No prior experience required! You will need a Windows/Mac/Linux laptop.

events.name: DEV Talk: Chris Pinchot
events.description: Chris Pinchot, CTO of Status, an e-commerce startup, will be talking about web development, his career as a software engineer, and entrepreneurship.

events.name: Intro to Full-Stack Web Dev, workshop with Node.js
events.description: Learn how to build a full-stack web application with Node.js. Basic knowledge of JavaScript from the Intro to Web Dev workshop is recommended. You will need a Windows/Mac/Linux laptop.
